page.title: 12OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a typical junior school.It is called Clarksfield Junior School.In our school we have a staffof eight teachers and one headmaster.The other people who look after us are a secretary an ancillary,caretakers and dinner ladies.We have a football pitch,a small swimming pool and a gymnasium which we use as a dinning hall.We do netball,rounders,badminton ,swimming,football,cricket,rugby and table tennis.We can stay after school for these activites if we want to.We all feel very proud of our school .Most children from our school decorate the hall and coridors very nicely.This makes our school very colourful.We do dramer and practice plays for our parents to come and watch.At Christmas we have school parties and in Summer some people go on a school holiday.
